reviews.review: Найс игруха, сначала страшная, потом нормас

- Click READY
- Searching for games
- No matches found
- Search again
- Still no matches
- Repeat this loop


"Ready Simulator 2016"

10/10 would READY again

Gran juego, muy divertido, el unico problema? la dificultad para jugar con amigos, puedes llevarte media hora para lograr coincidir con un amigo en una partida, por no nombrar las innumerable veces que no encuentra partida o te saca cuando ya estabas cargando, por lo demas todo bien, buen contenido y demás, pero necesita arreglar esos errores.

One of the most intense, funny, difficult games I have played in a while. If you're looking for a new game to get for a well price, you've found it. Simply enough said in the first sentence. This game will have your heart pounding...both in and out of game. Only flaws I've discovered was the matchmaking while in a group. We always get sent back to the "ready up" lobby and it is quite a bit annoying. But if you queue up solo, you'll find a game within seconds.

Cheers!

Ein gutes Spiel mit hohen Spaßfaktor

Kurze Zusammenfassung:  4 "Überlebende" müssen 5 Generatoren reparieren um 2 Ausgangstore mit Strom zu versorgen, der Killer versucht alle Überlebenden zu fangen und an den Haken die über die ganze Map verteilt sind aufzuhängen.
Da das Spiel aber noch relativ neu ist gibt es noch viele Fehler die, die Entwickler verbessern müssen. (Mit Freunden in einer Lobby besser Spiele finden usw.)  Außerdem müssen Killer irgendwie vom campen abgehalten werden. (Beispiel: Wenn ein Killer bei einem aufgehängten Opfer im Umkreis von 30 Metern steht, werden von allen Überlebenden Generatoren schneller repariert.)
I would rather have my nuts crushed with a sledgehammer than be a killer main in the new update

Great way to get stress out give this game a 8 out of 10.
Issues with Game Sever gliches out sometimes.
Windows seem to glich some times as well.
very nice game

This game is so much fun.

Vorsicht ! Es werden ein paar Inhalte vom Spiel erwähnt. Es ist vlt. zwar nicht wirklich Spoiler dennoch möchte ich dies hier schonmal erwähnen.




Dead by Daylight ist eig. ein super Spiel, aber es macht nur mit Freunden Spaß ! In Spielen sind 8 von 10 Killer erbärmliche Camper. Verstecken sich in einer kleinen Ecke und warten darauf das jemand sein Opfer zur Hilfe eilt und Ihn rettet. Als Geist ist es besonders unfair da man kein Herzklopfen hört. Erfahrene Spieler meckern zwar das Spieler im High Rank bereich sich das nich leisten können, weil Sie zu wenig Punkte kriegen, aber dies ist bei den kleinen egal. Dieses erbärmliche Camping macht das Spiel für den erhängten kein Spaß da er definitiv stirbt und sogar für den Tod anderer mehr oder weniger verantwortlich ist. Ich als Opfer quitte sofort damit andere nicht mal versuchen den Killer zu folgen. Wen ich jemanden helfen möchte rette ich ihn und lass den Killer mich aufhängen und verlasse dann das Spiel x). Kriege für sowas paar hundert Punkte aber egal xD. Nur flüchten und Generatoren reparieren ist einfach langweilig. Es würde es vlt. einfacher wen die Überlebenden durch Voice-Chat miteinander reden könnten, aber einen eingefleischten Killer sollte man einfach selbst aufhängen :D ruiniert den Spiel Spaß. Es werden sich vlt. welche Fragen, wen es mit Freunden Spaß macht wieso ich den Kauf nicht empfehle. Ich habe mitbekommen das die Entwickler die Spielart "camping", begrüßen bzw. erlauben. Für mich persönlich ist das ein eigener K.O. Schlag und eine Frechheit es eine Spielart zu nennen ! Naja vlt. bin auch zu sehr durch CoD geprägt.


An alle Käufer die das Spiel spielen und ertragen wünsche ich noch viel Spaß :D !
лютая
fun game, but can be incredibly unbalanced at points. not to mention there are several areas the surviror(s) can loop around making it impossible to catch them.

一款体验上很优秀（把外挂和改档除去的话）技术上却算不上优秀的游戏
先说缺点，体验上就是外挂和改档实在是多，改档对于已经跨过新手阶段的人还好说，但对于新手就很尴尬了。你说你一个20段新手屠夫没技能结果匹配到一堆20段弹射自摸拆迁怎么玩？你一20段没技能的新手人类遇到一20段一刀鹰眼铁手鹿头踢板子怎么玩？当然，一旦你上手了这游戏，改档就不那么可气了毕竟你有了一些技能，而改档也不一定有技术。但外挂在任何时候，对于任何带竞技性的游戏都是毁灭性的打击。严重影响了任何人的体验。加速隐身砍人透视你说怎么玩？由于种种原因官方对改档的处罚其实是很难实行的（除非大量举报），而官方对于外挂狗的处罚也处于刚刚实行的阶段。还有一个很重要的一点就是卡，屠夫一卡，人类全遭殃四个猎空真是要哭。恕我直言，你卡玩X的屠夫呀[spoiler] 要玩也去外服呀（笑	[/spoiler]。技术上的缺点在于众多的BUG和匹配机制，匹配机制先不说，众多的BUG实在蛋疼，比如抱不了人的BUG，还有众多的BUG点（比如著名的墙角抱不起的点）
优点？优点其实一个就够了，那就是让你感到慌。是不是很慌？慌就对了。恐怖气氛的营造和那份紧张感，还有劫后余生的欣喜，就是这款游戏的魅力所在。什么，你说你玩屠夫被人皇6？玩人类被屠皇屠杀？不好意思，请努力成为人皇屠皇吧

I played this in the closed beta for a day before it went up for sale here. The concept had me excited from the start, 4 people playing helpess survivors while someone else plays a killer trying to hang everyone on meat hooks? Unique, and right away sounds like a [i] KILLER [/i] time.

I loved the gameplay, but I was also playing with a full lobby of my friends, so initally I wasn't sure of the amount of replay value that it had. I went ahead and bought it anyway, and I can happily say that I was wrong to doubt it, as I found that having some random person you've never met or spoken to chasing after you trying to murder you is SUPER fun whether you're by yourself, or partied with 1-3 other people. Of course. playing with just a lobby of your friends  and a killer you know is great fun as well!

The leveling/progression system is very unique in itself, you level your characters as you spend the points that you get at the end of each round to unlock items, item attachments, perks, etc. Your characters do level individually, but each character has some unique perks and the points that you earn in game can be used to level any character. 

Overall, I highly recommend this game!

Dead by Daylight, un gioco molto bello e divertente, anche se è chiaro che si potrebbe fare di più.
Il gioco si presenta bene:
atmosfera ben ricreata, musiche messe in modo da farti andare nel panico... 
Unica pecca per ora è il matchmaking,specialmente in Survive with Friends, che ti fa impiegare mezzora per trovare una lobby buona, ma fortunatamente i devs continuano a rilasciare nuovi aggiornamenti e patch.
A parer mio ci vorrebbe qualche modalità in più, in modo da non rendere il gioco troppo monotono.

P.S. per chi dice che da survivor è impossibile scappare, si sbaglia. Mostro e survivor sono ben equilibrati, e per scappare basta semplicemente avere una vaga idea di cosa fare in determinate situazioni.

The priniciple of this game is very nice, and with the right people this can be a very fun game.
However, there are many negative sides to this game, including the increasing number of bugs and glitches.

Pros:
 - Even though the devs don't like the teamwork, it really can help you survive
 - A good killer versus a good team of survivors makes the game challenging and fun for all players

Cons:
 - A lot of salty and hateful players
 - Many bugs and glitches
 - The devs speak of "balance", but it only means that the killers need to have a massive advantage over the survivors
 - [strike]The game is P2P hosted by the killer[/strike]
 - [strike]A lot of laggy killers[/strike]
 - Cheating killers (lag switchers, other cheats/hacks)
 - The whole game is geared towards killers

This game could have been such a great game, but there are a lot of issues that the devs apparently cannot and/or do not want to fix.
Also, the game strongly favours the killers. For example, at patch release 1.0.4 the killers were immensely overpowered (killers even complaining on the forum that it had become too easy for them), however patch 1.0.5 brought more advantages for killers than it did for survivors.

But the main issue I have with this game is the extremely salty and hateful killers. This is probably also due to the huge amount of players being under the indicated age of 17+ (I've encountered many players of 14 and under).

I wrote a long ass review about this game but steam didn't save it for some reason, so I'm keeping this short

Survivor
If your playing survivor you have to depend on your teammates to repair generators when you're being chased by the killer, and some of them choose to do everything besides that, they can search chests and disable hooks along with shrines instead. Also knowing its a team game I have been left on the hook to die without any of my teammates even bothering to save me. Plus some killers camp you if you're hooked, not fun.

Killer
The only bad thing about the killer is if your not playing the trapper survivors can play ring around the rosie with you and a pallet, and when you get close to them they slam the pallet on your head and then they run to the next pallet. By the time he/she has no pallets all the generators are completed and all the survivors are gone.

The Web
The web is where you use the bloodpoints to get rewards, the web is randomly generated and the rewards you get change the game completely. The perks and rewards you can get are disgustingly better than others. Since it's randomly generated you're going to have to spend bloodpoints on trash you don't want in order to progress through the web and get to the items you do want. Its almost as if the game is based off of luck instead of skill.

Крайне интересная хоррор игра, в которой так же есть мультиплеер что необходимо для такого жанра. Новичкам игра покажется очень страшной, пугающей. Но те у кого уже как минимум 300 ч игра становится не страшной,там уже есть разные "правила" но это сложно объяснить в обзоре,так как там очень много внутреигровых вещей. Я крайне рекомендую эту игру,здесь есть прокачка, перки, различные предметы, в общем игра достаточно разнообразна. Так же хочу отметить длс, в длс отлично проработаны все маньяки и это осень круто, естественно сурвов это тоже касается. Емли вы думаете купить или не купить, то я склоняюсь к первому варианту,потому что игра великолепна, по крайней мере для меня.

Just got back into the game after a year break, gotta say the game has improved. Only big problem I have is that the game is greatly in the killers favor, as long as you are decent at killer the survivors will often all die. (Increasing the number of hooks and making them respawn has made the sabotage feature useless aside from getting points). Still I recommend checking this game out with some friends and have a bit of fun, whether the games are one sided or not. FINAL RATING (when playing with friends) - 8/10

Thanks to the support team for helping me in a timely fashion, thats always a plus.

Okay, update, I'm going back on my previous rec for this game from before. Buy White Noise 2 and save yourself $10 and many hours sitting in broken lobbies. White Noise 2 is everything Dead by Daylight could be if they had Devs more invested in FIXING THEIR BROKEN GAME instead of making $5+ Gameplay and Cosmetic DLC. 
White Noise 2 is a finished 4v1 horror game with 10 survivors and 4 killers displaying unique traits in an in depth statistics system. Unlockable characters, skins, and flashlight perks definitely beat having to pay to unlock characters that should be free to begin with. Give it a shot, for $10 you will have a much more enjoyable experience.
Muito Bom! Vicia!

Aside from the matchmaking this game is insanely fun. It's annoying with the wait times but overall very very fun! Especially if you really love clenching your butthole.

Edit #1 Matchmaking still isn't fixed. The whole killer camping the hook meta is getting ridiculous. There needs to be a way to see your ping. Typing 1 1 1 in chat can only go so far to tell you the connection to your killer. I still recommend this as it's fun but the issues need to be handled as I'm losing serious hope for this game.

游戏还行，可玩性挺高的，但是给予新手的生存空间太过狭窄，游戏说明中又没有给出遇到困难相应的处理方式。从某种角度上来说，会使得玩家很不愿意在遇见困难的情况下继续游戏，希望游戏制作者可以多给一些提示，毕竟谁都不愿意比谁差，尤其是坑了队友以后的负罪感太过强烈，真的会让人失去信心。

Spiel macht viel Spaß, sowohl als Flüchtiger als auch als Killer.

Nach 58 Spielstunden kann ich sagen, dass es ein tolles Spielprinzip mit Langzeitmotivation ist, 
jedoch noch viele nervige Bugs beinhaltet, sowie das Feststecken an bestimmten Stellen, oder man kann das Opfer nicht mehr aufheben, usw.

Dennoch zu empfehlen, wenn man nicht allzu empfindlich ist.

Do you love playing with your friends? Do you love dying with your friends?

Well good luck with this game! Updated to play with friends, and bam!
You'll spend the better part of half an hour just trying to find a game to no evail.
Servers still suck apparently, so that's great.

It is a fun game by yourself though.

10/10, would recommend to a friend.

The game has its issues, mostly in the balance between survivor and Killer perks and the matchmaking system. Although, it is a game that is constantly being worked on, with new events, DLCs, updates to fix any big issue that arises, period, you can see the BHVR really cares for their game, and tries to care for its players.
The community is pretty bad, and you will get reported or cussed out for reasons that don't merit it, but its rare enough that it shouldn't be an issue.
If you have the time and patience to get good at the game, either as survivor or your preffered killer, than this game is a lot of fun, and I know several people who have over a thousand hours in the past year its been out. Its a good game that people enjoy, and if you're patient and can deal with a loss here and there, I'm sure you will too.

I'm in love with this game! Honestly! It's a very nice game to play, very entertaining and fun! :D
Also, for a better experience i recommend playing with other friends and using a medium range PC for the best performance! ;)

EDIT: After many hours later, still enjoying the game. Seems like they did a few optimization fixes since the last time i wrote the review, so i'd say even a lower tier PC can do this game pretty good. The community is still the same, good and bad people, just like any other game community out there, and overall, it's still an enjoyable game that is updated regularly and new content keeps coming out like hot bread.
Grałem w to tylko chwile i już mi sie podoba! :D I ta przyjemnośc z zabijania, mmm coś niesamowitego :D

- Play as Killer
- Killed 3 out of 4 survivors
- Search for the last one
- Finally found him
- He runs away from me, cheesing the window infinite loop tactic
- We do loops for 5 straight minutes around the house
- Finally I land my first hit on him
- Another 5 fuckin minutes around the house
- Second hit
- He is down
- Ring the wraith bell
- He tries to get up
- hit him again, he is down
- repeat the torture for over 30 minutes
- he ragequits
- 10/10 psychological murderer in progress
- Best game i bought on steam, lets you make your enemies rage AND you get bonus points from it 10/10, 10/10

This review is for version 1.05 of the game with me having played about 50-60 hours. 
I really love the feel of this game.  It brings to mind the classic slasher flicks from the 80s like Friday the 13th, Halloween and Nightmare on Elm Street.  
I'm always tense and on the edge of my seat when I play as a survivor, praying the killer keeps away from me long enough for me to restart this piece of junk, busted generator.  
Conversely, playing the killer is a huge rush.  I love watching the survivors scatter like cockroches when I come out of the dark night. I can't help cackling madly as I chase them down and hook 'em.  Gotta catch 'em all!
That being said, there are some issues with it.  Camping someone that's been put on a hook, is an understandable but annoying strategy that many killers tend to use.  I'd like to see the killer get reduced points for corpse camping, or the victem get more points for occupying the killer's time or some combination thereof.
Also, the game lobby seems to be seriously wonky.  Sometimes you'll get dropped from a lobby or get stuck on 'searching for a match' for what seems like forever.  It can sometimes take over 5 minutes between finishing one match and getting into the next.  
I still recommend Dead By Daylight, because once you get into the game it really is a heck of a lot of fun.  Hopefully we will see improvements with the connection and balance issues in future updates.
this game is cool
